functions.description: In addition to the required url parameter, the custom function =XBRL.showData() includes three optional parameters to display facets of the information queried. Click on XBRL.showData or 'Help on this function' in this window to learn more.
functions.name: showData

parameters.description: [required string]: The url of the api call that's to be called
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: [optional string] (blank|fields|name): Determines how the information will be returned: blank - 'data' without the metadata; fields - a tree of the fields in the data array; name - with a 'fieldname' to filter on information for the specified field
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: [optional string]: with name as above - different levels are separated by a '/'
parameters.name: fieldname

parameters.description: [optional boolean]: toggle column header display for the output
parameters.name: showheaders
